snippet.title: Hello Neighbor - Official Announcement Trailer | Stadia
snippet.description:
Experience the stealth horror game Hello Neighbor and Hello Neighbor: Hide and Seek when they arrive on Stadia later this year.
 
Hello Neighbor is a Stealth Horror Game about sneaking into your neighbor's house and figuring out what he's hiding in the basement. Comes out on Stadia on September 1st, 2020.
 
Hide and Seek follows the tragic story of the Neighbor’s family in this dramatic prequel to Hello Neighbor. Comes out on Stadia on November 1st, 2020.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://youtube.com/GoogleStadia
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GoogleStadia
Follow us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/GoogleStadia
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/googlestadia
